column4: I hate to be a broken record but I would greatly appreciate it if someone could just tell me if it is possible to assign different backgrounds to different workspaces. So far all the methods i have tried, including kde, have not been able to do this. I would just like to know if it is possible.
i have tried that and the disabeling the nautalis draw desktop and it has not cooperated, thanks for the suggestion i will ask there!!!:)
